name: PittyTiger, Pitty Panda, Operation “The Eye of the Tiger”
description:
Heatmap of (sub)techniques for PittyTiger, Pitty Panda, Operation “The Eye of the Tiger”. Source datasets can be found here: https://github.com/tropChaud/Categorized-Adversary-TTPs

MITRE ATT&CK profile: https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0011
